description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5vtdq","text":"This protocol details the analysis of histology images, including usage of Matlab codes to draw regions of interest (ROIs) and  ilastik software to perform pixel classification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

parent_collections.title: "Reward perseveration is shaped by GABAA-mediated dopamine pauses", Burwell et al

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"tkep","text":"Go to the folder with all of the .vsi images from one brain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2rcf8","text":"Use the ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"adedv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"343am","text":" Matlab code to manually draw regions of interest (ROIs) of the left VTA and right VTA per section.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"19iu7","text":"HistoROI","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ft6s5","text":"Change the channels and intensities (top right table) as needed to visualize your signal.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2csh","text":"Make sure the tissue is oriented correctly (left hemisphere on the left) – use the “VS200” button to rotate, and the “FlipLR” button to flip horizontally, as necessary.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6j0j7","text":"Click the “PP” button to draw two polygons.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eas79","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6and8","text":"Left VTA first, then right VTA.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9mrj","text":"After both polygons are drawn, you can move points on the polygon to edit them.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c9doa","text":"Repeat for each section with the VTA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqmv1","text":"These drawn ROIs automatically save in a ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5837a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c87n","text":" structure, but you can click “SaveBkp” to create a backup if there are any issues.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"408iu","text":"HistoROI.mat","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"khb2","text":"For pixel intensity calculation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c90t8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7utbe","text":"Run ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"effnm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"76mv","text":" to calculate the fluorescence of the specified channels in your drawn ROIs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vpea","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1pdpa","text":"Then run ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ev8n","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bkm4b","text":" to extract quantifications from the calculated analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1irik","text":"HistoOfflineAnalysis","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3u7s2","text":"HistoVTASummaryDV","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5t7lm","text":"For cell counting:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"n7id","text":"Perform Object Classification:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5052q","text":"Run ilastik software (https://www.ilastik.org/documentation/).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":40}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6DEEBB48F0D811EEA5500A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.ilastik.org/documentation/)."}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ln6q","text":"Perform Pixel Classification:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3g1n4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evi8f","text":"Load raw data (the previously created jpg images).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"442d2","text":"Feature selection:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg6t0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"doeas","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1qejl","text":"Training: train the algorithm to detect a cell versus not-cell (background tissue) by manually labeling cell and background in various sections.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2g8r3","text":"Once you are happy with the segmentation performed by the classifier, export all predictions.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":159,"id":460204,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qbprbixhx.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qbpnbixhx.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qbpqbixhx.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qbpkbixhx.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"206cm","text":"Save the ROIs as jpg images by clicking “Export” in the ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6f21","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8t9hu","text":" code GUI, making sure the contrast allows visualization of cells and color of cells and only channels of interest are turned on.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"code_insert","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b35ek","text":"HistoROI","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3asts","text":"Load raw data (jpg images) and prediction maps (the predictions from pixel classification).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3hbh1","text":"Use standard Threshold and Size Filter settings.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fsl5e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a01j2","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1lssu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"height":338.3312368972747,"id":460211,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","originalFile":{},"original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qbpzbixhx.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qbpvbixhx.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qbpybixhx.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qbpubixhx.webp","width":295.03473491773315}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3mtcc","text":"Click “Select Features”.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"vsd","text":"In Object Classification, create 3 label classes: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9oo6a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54dom","text":"red only, ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2tci","text":"green only, and ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8n08c","text":"both.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"742hj","text":"Train the algorithm to classify these 3 classes by labeling different cells as having red only (ex, only dTomato), green only (ex, only TH or GCaMP), or both (yellow, both proteins).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"esaa","text":"Once you are happy with the predictions from the classifier, export the Object Identities as .csv files.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"11oim","text":"Use these .csv files to count how many cells were identified in each label class across all the sections.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Histology: Analysis Protocol
